## rule() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates a new rule builder with the given name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function rule(name: string): RuleBuilder;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

<tbody><tr><td>

string


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[RuleBuilder](./change-detector-core.rulebuilder.md)

## Example


```ts
rule('export-removal')
  .target('export')
  .action('removed')
  .returns('major')
```
